rules_text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Spinner of Yarns gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you cast that spell from a graveyard, instead put a +1/+1 counter on Spinner of Yarns.
rules_text2:
[i](Cast this only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)[/i]
Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.
